Room.Name: Kista Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the northern checkpoint for the city of Kista, on Kista Avenue.
Room.LongDescription: Travelers must present their papers whenever they enter or leave the grand city of Kista. Their is a tax for all but true scholars, since this city was built as a repository for knowledge. Scholars are welcome to stay and study, but others must pay a toll if they are simply visiting or stopping for the night. The gate is immediately north of here.
